actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received from DOD.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation

official_title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that a member of the Armed Forces, upon the member's release or discharge from active duty, shall be provided with a copy of the member's medical and personnel records.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the military department concerned, upon the discharge or release of a member of the armed forces from active duty, to provide such member with a copy of his or her medical and personnel records.

titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to provide that a member of the Armed Forces, upon the member's release or discharge from active duty, shall be provided with a copy of the member's medical and personnel records.
